name: py-flake8-polyfill

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
flake8-polyfill is a package that provides some compatibility helpers
for Flake8 plugins that intend to support Flake8 2.x and 3.x
simultaneously.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-flake8
dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependent_to.name: py-pep8-naming
dependent_to.description: Check PEP-8 naming conventions, plugin for flake8.
